headline: Assessing Sable Offshore (SOC) Valuation After Financing Revamp, Equity Raise, and Strategic Offshore Pivot
summary: Sable Offshore (SOC) just announced a major amendment to its senior secured term loan with Exxon Mobil. This change is contingent on raising at least $225 million in new equity and meeting other typical closing conditions. See our latest analysis for Sable Offshore. Sable Offshore’s stock has seen dramatic swings lately, driven largely by its financing overhaul and operational pivot from leasing to purchasing its offshore production vessel. After spiking over 10% in a day, the 1-month share...
